name: SCORCH (itch) (Mazander Entertainment)
description:
UH OH! You peed all over your owner's bed for the last time, to pay for your crimes you have been sentenced to death- no exceptions. Use your trusty fireball and quick wits to fend off waves monsters for a final showdown against the one who banished you to this realm. Careful, you ONLY have 9 lives! CONTROLS
  1. WASD for movement
  2. Q and E for camera rotation
  3. Left Click to shoot fireballs
  4. Right Click to teleport

Created October 2022
